W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLESOUL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLESOUL_000_DETAIL.text: Though there was no triangle in the final temple, the little ghost seems to know something.

W07_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You found the ruins of what was likely a temple on the other side of the door. Four tribes inhabit this worldâ€”but which can best help you track down a triangle?
